programs.title: U17 Competitive
programs.desc: This program is for girls who are experienced players (e.g. have been promoted from our club development program or played in their school volleyball team). Players in this program will represent the club to attend various tournaments and friendly matches throughout the season.
programs.admision: 16-17 years old depending on date of birth
programs.address: 4901 Rue du Collège - Beaubois, Pierrefonds, QC H8Y 3T4

programs.title: DEV 1
programs.desc: This programs is primarily for young athletes who are willing to try a new sport in a supportive, non-competitive enviroment.  Players will be trained on fundamentals of volleyball skills. The focus of the program is to prepare the players for school team selections, and enable them to join one of our club's competitive teams.
programs.address: 4901 Rue du Collège - Beaubois, Pierrefonds, QC H8Y 3T4
